last_episode_to_air.name: Marathon Lover
last_episode_to_air.overview: Remy and Jennifer Ramsaran are living the American dream in Upstate New York. When Remy begins an affair with Jennifer's best friend he's unaware that his wife has become engrossed in a virtual affair. The only plausible outcome is a deadly one.

name: Scorned: Love Kills
overview: Scorned: Love Kills is an American documentary television series on Investigation Discovery that premiered on January 21, 2012 and features tales of love gone fatally wrong.

episodes.name: Behind the Picket Fence
episodes.overview: An Army Major lay lifeless in his bed, shot twice at close range while sleeping next to his wife. Investigators would soon uncover an intricately planned murder plot involving sex parties, adultery and coercion.

episodes.name: Never Enough
episodes.overview: A successful attorney lay dead in her bathtub, victim of an apparent drowning. Even her family assumed it was an accident - but an 11th hour autopsy revealed a far darker truth. Even more shocking was the killer.

episodes.name: Desperate Housewife
episodes.overview: A bored housewife gets a job as a stripper and begins a sultry double life. While her husband is working she brings home acquaintances from her new job for sexual escapades. When one of her flings turns more serious, a sinister plan emerges.

episodes.name: Hot for Teacher
episodes.overview: The seductive highschool teacher befriends a group of her students. It isn't long before she develops a romance with a 15 year old student. Luring him further with false allegations of abuse at the hands of her husband, a sinister plot emerges.

episodes.name: Afternoon Delight
episodes.overview: A conservative couple in Arizona has the family of their dreams, but things unravel when the wife is discovered brutally murdered. The investigation uncovers a lust-fuelled affair, a cold-blooded murder and someone isn't who they seem.

episodes.name: The Showgirl and the Salesman
episodes.overview: When Jay Orbin's torso is discovered in the desert cops conclude he's been shot before being frozen and dismembered. Questioning his glamorous wife, Marjorie, reveals a string of affairs and a tale of greed and lust that ends with cold blooded murder.

episodes.name: Judgment Day
episodes.overview: The 1999 murder of Leann Fletcher at the hands of her husband is detailed.

episodes.name: The Au Pair Affair
episodes.overview: In winter of 2007 Stephen Grant reports his wife Tara has gone missing after an argument. For weeks Grant plays the distraught husband to the media, but after a shocking discovery, revelations surface of an illicit affair and a bone chilling murder.

episodes.name: Letter from the Grave
episodes.overview: In December of 1998 in the upscale village of Pleasant Prairie, Wisconsin, Mark Jensen poisons his 40-year-old wife Julie with antifreeze and proceeds to marry his mistress, Kelly.

episodes.name: House of Deception
episodes.overview: Wealthy home builder, Larry and his client, Rozanne are involved in a passionate extramarital affair. When the relationship is exposed, the jealousy and greed that follow lead to a brutal murder and an international search for a very unlikely killer.

episodes.name: A Fatal Affair
episodes.overview: On Valentine's Day 2010 in the suburbs of Atlanta, Georgia, Chad Dunn confronts his wife Shelley, after he finds out that she is seeing another man.

episodes.name: Hot and Sweet
episodes.overview: Schoolteacher Keyon is involved in a love triangle with his pregnant fianc√© Avis and the sexy, new English teacher Carla. When one of the three is found brutally murdered, the affair is exposed and the hunt for the killer begins.

episodes.name: Sunday School Killers
episodes.overview: In November of 2001, a successful advertising executive is murdered in his Oklahoma City garage. There are no suspects, until his wife and children don't show up at his funeral, and a tangle of illicit affairs and murderous plotting is revealed.

episodes.name: 'Til Debt Do Us Part
episodes.overview: High school coach, Russ Stager is happily married to his loving, church-going wife Barbara until he discovers her obsessive lies and torrid affair. Determined to make the marriage work, Russ forgives her which proves to be a very deadly mistake.

episodes.name: Sneaking Suspicion
episodes.overview: Football star David Temple has an illicit affair with his co-worker behind his pregnant wife's back.

episodes.name: Crazy for You
episodes.overview: Oil tycoon, Jimmy Joste is obsessed with former rodeo queen Rhonda Glover. Despite her infidelity, he lavishes her with riches and she blows his mind with erotic sexual encounters until their tumultuous life of excess leads them to destruction.

episodes.name: Lover In The Closet
episodes.overview: The 2005 murder of Jeff Freeman exposes an unusual living arrangement for his wife's lover.

episodes.name: Wigs and a Gun
episodes.overview: Piper Rountree, a sassy Texas gal, is bored and having an affair in conservative Virginia. When she and her husband Fred divorce and he wins custody of their children, will Piper mastermind a diabolical plan to kill her ex and get her kids back?

episodes.name: Sub-Prime Murder
episodes.overview: When a successful mortgage broker enters rehab, his wife starts having an affair and later asks for a divorce. On a vacation with their two boys, the wife is found drowned in a foot of water. An accident, or a scorned husband driven to murder?

episodes.name: Master of Seduction
episodes.overview: When she relocates to Florida in 2007, Tausha Fields is hiding from a sordid past. She is at the center of a tumultuous love triangle in Missouri which ended in the disappearance of her husband Mitchell Wayne Kemp.

episodes.name: Deadly Game
episodes.overview: The second season opens with a workplace love triangle that ends in murder.

episodes.name: Blood on the Boardwalk
episodes.overview: A love triangle involving a pool-hall owner, his wife and a cocktail waitress unfolds.

episodes.name: Mortal Sin
episodes.overview: A college student's lover is murdered, and suspicion falls on both him and his roommate, a minister at a local church.

episodes.name: Slave to Love
episodes.overview: Extramarital affairs have deadly consequences for a couple.

episodes.name: Best Friends for Never
episodes.overview: A married woman's boyfriend threatens to break up with her and begin dating her former girlfriend.

episodes.name: Devil Inside
episodes.overview: An illicit affair between a religious bodyguard and his wife's friend has a fatal outcome.

episodes.name: Rules of Engagement
episodes.overview: A young Navy wife faces temptation after her husband leaves for an overseas mission.

episodes.name: Love You to Death
episodes.overview: A woman is killed by her ex-boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Millionaire's Mistress
episodes.overview: A married woman becomes involved in a dangerous affair with a millionaire.

episodes.name: Deadly Threesome
episodes.overview: A three-way relationship in Iowa turns deadly.

episodes.name: Killer Beauty
episodes.overview: A woman's affair with a successful businessman is plagued by obsession, jealousy and violence.

episodes.name: Addicted to Sex
episodes.overview: A married woman has an affair with a much younger man.

episodes.name: Deadly Attractions
episodes.overview: A deadly love triangle unfolds when a married woman has an affair with a coworker.

episodes.name: Bring on the Heat
episodes.overview: A police officer cheats on his college sweetheart with a coworker, but he finds himself in over his head when she gets pregnant.

episodes.name: You've Got Hate Mail
episodes.overview: A married man receives frightening e-mails from his mistress, and the love triangle ends in murder.

episodes.name: Fatal Fantasy
episodes.overview: A dentist's wife is found dead.

episodes.name: Black Widower
episodes.overview: Examining the case of Drew Peterson, a four-times-married policeman who was convicted of the 2004 murder of his third wife, Kathleen Savio.

episodes.name: Love Thy Rabbi
episodes.overview: A rabbi's wife is murdered.

episodes.name: Shadow Stalker
episodes.overview: A dog trainer stalks his ex-wife.

episodes.name: Love Is the Drug
episodes.overview: Chronicling a love triangle between two women and a male drug dealer.

episodes.name: Naval Affairs
episodes.overview: A love triangle involving a married couple and a young naval doctor is detailed in the Season 3 premiere.

episodes.name: Caskets and Strippers
episodes.overview: A married man has two affairs at the same time, one with an old girlfriend and the other with a stripper.

episodes.name: Lipstick Love Triangle
episodes.overview: A same-sex love triangle ends badly.

episodes.name: God's Gift to Women
episodes.overview: A church pastor has an affair with his secretary.

episodes.name: Roommates With Benefits
episodes.overview: A man gets caught up in a love triangle with his wife and a childhood friend.

episodes.name: Bedside Manner
episodes.overview: A former beauty-pageant contestant takes a job as a head nurse and becomes involved with a wealthy doctor.

episodes.name: Tall, Dark and Deadly
episodes.overview: A divorced mother of five looks for love online, but her new suitors turn out to be dangerous.

episodes.name: Visions of Lust
episodes.overview: A woman learns that her husband has been unfaithful to her.

episodes.name: Slave for Love
episodes.overview: A man's dark secrets come to the fore after his wife is killed.

episodes.name: Lover's Roulette
episodes.overview: An unhappy marriage between an unfaithful man and his gambling-addicted wife ends in violence.

episodes.name: Sergeant Swinger
episodes.overview: All's fair in love and war when an Air Force captain's wife has an affair with an Army sergeant while her husband is away.

episodes.name: Funeral Homewrecker
episodes.overview: Mortician Michael Roseboro has an adulterous affair with a neighbor that leads to murder.

episodes.name: The Doctor Will See You Now
episodes.overview: Dr. Dirk Greineder's steamy trysts with a female escort take a deadly turn for the worst.

episodes.name: Sex on the Beach
episodes.overview: The hostility between wealthy businessman Ted Ammon and his wife, Generosa, leads to revenge and murder.

episodes.name: The Virgin and the Bachelorette Party
episodes.overview: After landing a wealthy software engineer, Rebecca begins a sleazy affair with a male stripper that leads to cold-blooded murder.

episodes.name: Disco Queen
episodes.overview: An unusual love triangle leads to the 1981 murder of Diane Delia who impersonated Diana Ross in nightclubs and discos before undergoing a sex-change operation.

episodes.name: I'll Have What She's Having
episodes.overview: In Miami, Michel's cozy life with girlfriend Yolanda will be wrecked by a steamy love affair that will have a fatal outcome.

episodes.name: Strippercam
episodes.overview: Wealthy businessman Allen sets the stage for disaster when he propositions a stripper named Marissa who has been keeping her husband, Dale, in the dark.

episodes.name: Swing and a Missus
episodes.overview: A merchant marine's lonely wife has a torrid affair with a bouncer leading to tragedy for everyone involved.

episodes.name: Teacher's Pet
episodes.overview: A professor falls for a high-end call girl after his marriage loses its zest and finds himself in a predicament when his wife finds out.

episodes.name: Mischief Of Staff
episodes.overview: Scott and Lisa are a happy couple, living the idyllic life in Indiana. But when Scott is reunited with his old flame Stacy, their steamy affair will rock their small town, anger their respective spouses and lead to someone paying the ultimate price.

episodes.name: Love Is A Battlefield
episodes.overview: American soldier Megan Touma has left her husband for her lover Edgar. Turns out Edgar has a spouse of his own. When Megan gets pregnant Edgar must make a decision between two women. Someone will be left brokenhearted and someone will be left dead.

episodes.name: Fatal Prophet
episodes.overview: Pastor Tracy and his wife Pauletta look like the perfect "Baptist power couple" - until Tracy falls for Tyonne, a close friend of his son William. Their sinful, not-so-secret affair sends shockwaves through the congregation and ends in murder.

episodes.name: The Doctor And The Beauty Queen
episodes.overview: Rich doctor and devoted Mormon, Martin MacNeill begins a torrid affair with fiery vixen, Gypsy Willis while his wife Michele tends to their children. But when Michele finds out and demands Martin end the affair, someone is bound to get burned.

episodes.name: Sex, Secrets & Sergeants
episodes.overview: While Kathy Lipscomb spends late nights at the hospital with the handsome Dr. Pearle, her husband's career in the Air Force is taking off, but so is his relationship with a hot young officer. When the affairs are exposed the consequences are fatal.

episodes.name: Prisoner Of Lust
episodes.overview: In 2011 newlyweds Seth and Lisa Techel are living in Wapello County, Iowa. They are both caught up in illicit, passionate affairs, and it all leads to an explosive, deadly confrontation.

episodes.name: Sex Lies And Hi-Fis
episodes.overview: Debra is living a real fairytale with the Car Stereo King of Chicago, Werner Hartmann. No price is too high to keep his queen happy, but when her expensive taste includes a hot new boy toy, it will cost more than Werner could have ever imagined.

episodes.name: Married To The Mob
episodes.overview: Lee Ann discovers the dark side of her husband, gym-owner Paul, and runs for help. Alex offers a shoulder to cry on; Rocco takes her to bed. But then, Paul and she seem to work things out‚Äîuntil late one night, when shots ring out behind the gym.

episodes.name: Handcuff For Three
episodes.overview: George Arthur and his wife are two of Los Angeles County Sheriff's finest, but when their open marriage mixes work with pleasure, their lives are forever changed by cold hearted killing that takes police more than a decade to solve.

episodes.name: Teacher, Teacher
episodes.overview: Paul and Betty Jeanne enjoy a peaceful life together in a tiny New York suburb. But when Paul starts a tawdry affair with his wealthy colleague Carolyn, their marriage is sent into a tailspin and ultimately leads to cold-blooded murder.

episodes.name: Northern Exposure
episodes.overview: Ruby and John Ruffolo's marriage is threatened when John's legal troubles drive him to multiple infidelities. Leaving a streak of scorned women in his wake, John mysteriously disappears. And the hunt for him reveals a deprave reality no one saw coming.

episodes.name: Blunt Force Drama
episodes.overview: Vickie Cushman is looking for love in all the wrong places... until she falls for married cop, Scott Hornoff. Everything's going great, or so she thinks. Not long after meeting him, she's found brutally murdered and police are sent on a wild goose chase.

episodes.name: Shot for Teacher
episodes.overview: Wisconsin carpenter Ruben Borchardt falls hard and fast for mysterious newcomer, Dianne. When they marry- just a few months after his first wife's death- Ruben finds himself on a disturbing path to the ultimate betrayal.

episodes.name: Kentucky Thrill Ride
episodes.overview: Mike and Elizabeth Turpin are the perfect couple. But when Elizabeth meets a mysterious woman with a disturbing secret she finds herself plunged into an out of control world of casual sex, drugs, steamy lesbian affairs, and ultimately- a murder.

episodes.name: Bear Down
episodes.overview: Shaun and Rhoni have been together for a very long time. But Shaun isn't exclusive with Rhoni. When he begins seeing a series of other women things begin spiraling out of control. Soon the stage is set for a horrific and tragic murder.

episodes.name: Naughty Not Nice
episodes.overview: Yamisha Thomas is a married woman who hasn't given up her party-girl lifestyle. Her husband's efforts to control her only have the opposite effect, pushing her into the arms of someone else. Will Yamisha's reckless decisions come back to haunt her?

episodes.name: Manhattan Murder Mystery
episodes.overview: Barbara Kogan is spending her fortune while her husband George scrambles to dig them out of debt by way of his mafia connections. Making matters worse, Barbara hires a hot, young publicist. It's the final straw for their marriage... and their lives.

episodes.name: Heavy Betting
episodes.overview: Brett and Tammy are living the ideal suburban life in an affluent South Carolina community. But when Brett's underground gambling business takes on a life of its own, their marriage suffers extreme debt and infidelity that comes to a deadly end.

episodes.name: A Playbook for Murder
episodes.overview: In 2008, Sam and Mirinda Boob are the toast of the tiny town of Centre Hall, Pennsylvania. But the former cheerleader has a taste for betrayal and it sends her right into the arms of a cold-blooded killer.

episodes.name: Marathon Lover
episodes.overview: Remy and Jennifer Ramsaran are living the American dream in Upstate New York. When Remy begins an affair with Jennifer's best friend he's unaware that his wife has become engrossed in a virtual affair. The only plausible outcome is a deadly one.
